NK051(zhi)005:1: // mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa rnam gsum bshad pa bzhugs so //
NK051(zhi)005:2: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba la /
NK051(zhi)005:3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba ni /
NK051(zhi)005:4: rang gi ngo bo ji lta bu zhig /
NK051(zhi)005:5: de'i mtshan ni gang dang gang rnams yin /
NK051(zhi)005:6: de yang dag par brjod pa ni ji ltar brjod ce na /
NK051(zhi)005:8: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te //
NK051(zhi)005:9: de ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid /
NK051(zhi)005:10: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo /
NK051(zhi)005:11: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid dang tha mi dad pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:12: de'i dbang gis snang ba'i gzugs kyi sku /
NK051(zhi)005:13: longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i bdag nyid can ye shes kyi rten du snang ba /
NK051(zhi)005:14: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams su
NK051(zhi)005:15: theg pa che chung gi tshul sna tshogs las grags
NK051(zhi)005:16: par snang ba'i bdag nyid de rnams kyang /
NK051(zhi)005:19: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi /
NK051(zhi)005:20: bdag nyid 'phags pa 'jam dpal yin na /
NK051(zhi)005:21: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi so
NK051(zhi)005:22: so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes rnams chos can
NK051(zhi)005:23: gcig gam tha dad pa zhig yin /
NK051(zhi)005:24: de bzhin du de'i chos nyid dang de'i mdzad pa'ang gcig gam tha dad pa zhig zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:26: de ni 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:27: kha cig gi tshul las ni /
NK051(zhi)005:28: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni ye shes kyi rgyud kyang tha dad /
NK051(zhi)005:30: de'i mdzad pa'ang tha dad de /
NK051(zhi)005:31: 'on kyang rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas mtshungs pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:36: yi ge mtshungs pa'o zhes 'dod do //
NK051(zhi)005:37: kha cig gi tshul las ni /
NK051(zhi)005:38: ye shes ni gang zag gi rgyud so so las bsgrub pa'i phyir tha dad de /
NK051(zhi)005:40: mdzad pa dag ni 'dres pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:41: tha dad med do zhes 'dod do //
NK051(zhi)005:42: kha cig gi tshul las ni /
NK051(zhi)005:43: bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud du 'byed pa ni bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags yin la /
NK051(zhi)005:44: bdag tu lta ba ni 'khrul pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:45: des bskyed cing de'i dbang gis snang ba ni /
NK051(zhi)005:46: de ltar bden pa ma yin pas /
NK051(zhi)005:47: sems can gyi dus na yang rgyud tha dad mi 'grub na /
NK051(zhi)005:48: bdag tu lta ba'i mdud pa mi mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas rnams la /
NK051(zhi)005:49: ye shes tha dad kyi rgyud ga la grub ste /
NK051(zhi)005:50: de bas na sangs rgyas rnams la ni rgyud tha dad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:51: rgyud tha dad pas don mdzad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:52: de bzhin du tshul tha dad pas don mdzad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:53: zhing tha dad du don mdzad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:54: dus tha dad du don mdzad pa mi mnga' ste /
NK051(zhi)005:55: ji srid du theg pa che chung gi gsung rab
NK051(zhi)005:56: rnams las 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes grags pa dang
NK051(zhi)005:57: / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
NK051(zhi)005:59: sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:64: dkon mchog dpal zhes bya ba stsogs par grags pa
NK051(zhi)005:65: longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i skur grags shing
NK051(zhi)005:70: dus tha dad du ye shes chen po'i rten du snang ba thams cad kyang /
NK051(zhi)005:71: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis chos nyid rtogs pa'i dbang dang /
NK051(zhi)005:72: sngon gyi smon lam dang thugs rje'i shugs kyis gdul
NK051(zhi)005:73: bya dkar po'i bag chags dang ldan pa'i blo la
NK051(zhi)005:74: so sor snang ba tsam gyis phye ba ma gtogs
NK051(zhi)005:75: pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang du ni bye brag
NK051(zhi)005:76: phra mo tsam yang rnyed pa ma yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:77: de bas na 'dir 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi yon tan brjod pa 'di ni /
NK051(zhi)005:78: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan brjod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:79: de la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi skur snang ba'i
NK051(zhi)005:80: tshul la brten nas tshul so sor grags pa ni
NK051(zhi)005:81: 'di lta ste / nyan thos kyi tshul las ni /
NK051(zhi)005:82: 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud du gtogs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:83: da dung 'phags pa'i lam ma thob pa so so'i skye bor 'dod do //
NK051(zhi)005:84: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thun mong du grags pa las ni /
NK051(zhi)005:85: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu'i dbang phyug tu 'dod do //
NK051(zhi)005:86: 'dzam bu'i gling na yang bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa'i 'khor du gyur pa yin la /
NK051(zhi)005:87: 'og min na yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
NK051(zhi)005:88: mdzad kyi nye ba'i sras su gyur pa yin no
NK051(zhi)005:89: zhe'o // mdo sde zab mo'i tshul las ni /
NK051(zhi)005:90: sngon gyi dus su sangs rgyas pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:91: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o zhe'o //
NK051(zhi)005:92: gsang sngags kyi tshul las ni kha cig las /
NK051(zhi)005:93: rigs kyi gtso bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor
NK051(zhi)005:94: las sprul pa'i bdag nyid byang chub sems pa'i tshul
NK051(zhi)005:96: rnal 'byor gyi tshul kha cig las ni /
NK051(zhi)005:97: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las
NK051(zhi)005:98: sprul pa'i ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen po bcu
NK051(zhi)005:99: drug las / rdo rje rnon po ste 'jam dpal rdo rje zhes 'dod do //
NK051(zhi)005:100: rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul kha cig las ni //
NK051(zhi)005:101: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhes kyang bya //
NK051(zhi)005:102: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje zhes kyang bya //
NK051(zhi)005:106: bde ba chen po la stsogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtso bo //
NK051(zhi)005:107: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mnga' bdag nyid du yang ston to //
NK051(zhi)005:108: 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba las ni /
NK051(zhi)005:109: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na 'jam pa'i rdo rje bzhugs te /
NK051(zhi)005:110: de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang /
NK051(zhi)005:111: ye shes sems dpa'i tshul gyis bzhugs so zhes 'dod do //
NK051(zhi)005:112: 'di dag ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bdag nyid bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)005:114: // 'phags pa 'jam dpal de'i mtshan ni gang dang gang rnams yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:115: ji srid du zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos sam /
NK051(zhi)005:116: zag pa med pa'i chos sam /
NK051(zhi)005:124: sems snang ba la stsogs te /
NK051(zhi)005:125: ji srid du chos rnams kyi rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i ming du grags pa /
NK051(zhi)005:126: 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag las grags pa'am /
NK051(zhi)005:127: theg pa chung ngu las grags pa'am /
NK051(zhi)005:128: theg pa chen las grags pa'am /
NK051(zhi)005:129: theg pa chen po'i yang chen po gsang sngags kyi tshul las grags pa yang rung ste /
NK051(zhi)005:130: chos rnams kyi ming ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni /
NK051(zhi)005:131: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan du ma gyur pa med de /
NK051(zhi)005:132: de bas na de dag thams cad mtshan du shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:134: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ming rnams ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan du rung ste /
NK051(zhi)005:135: 'phags pa 'jam dpal nyid zag pa med pa thob pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir rung na /
NK051(zhi)005:136: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ming de'i mtshan du ji ltar 'gyur /
NK051(zhi)005:137: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni zag pa'i chos thams cad yongs su zad pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:138: de rnams kyi ming de'i mtshan du mi rung ngo zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:139: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni zag pa med pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid can yin mod kyi /
NK051(zhi)005:142: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)005:143: de la khyab pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)005:144: der 'phrul pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)005:145: de la dga' ba yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)005:146: de mkhyen pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)005:147: de gsung ba yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)005:148: de yongs su dag pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)005:149: de la mnga' brnyes pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)005:150: de bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)005:151: de nyid las skyes pa yang yin pa'i phyir te /
NK051(zhi)005:153: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la yang shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:155: de chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam bdag nyid yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:157: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog /
NK051(zhi)005:158: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin //
NK051(zhi)005:159: skye med chos te sna tshogs ston //
NK051(zhi)005:160: chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang //
NK051(zhi)005:161: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //
NK051(zhi)005:162: rnam shes sna tshogs rgyud dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)005:164: sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi //
NK051(zhi)005:166: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don //
NK051(zhi)005:168: don 'grub bsam pa grub pa ste //
NK051(zhi)005:169: kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs //
NK051(zhi)005:170: shes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'i skabs su bshad pa /
NK051(zhi)005:171: dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /
NK051(zhi)005:172: dngos po med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin dang /
NK051(zhi)005:173: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)005:176: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can gyi skabs su
NK051(zhi)005:177: sems dang yid dang rnam par rig pa snang ba
NK051(zhi)005:178: dang bcas pa'i bdag nyid 'jam dpal lo zhes bshad
NK051(zhi)005:179: pa dang / de bzhin sdug bsngal zhi'i skabs su /
NK051(zhi)005:181: sdug bsngal nyid du bshad pa la yang sdug bsngal ni /
NK051(zhi)005:182: sdug bsngal sgrub par byed pa'i kun 'byung du bshad la /
NK051(zhi)005:183: zhi ba ni 'gog par bshad de /
NK051(zhi)005:184: de dag kyang 'phags pa 'jam dpal yin par bshad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:185: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i skabs su bdag tu lta ba rnam pa bcur bshad la /
NK051(zhi)005:187: gnyen po rnam pa bcur bshad de /
NK051(zhi)005:188: de ltar na mi mthun pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:189: gnyen po de dag 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo zhes
NK051(zhi)005:190: bshad pa lta bu la stsogs pa chos thams cad
NK051(zhi)005:191: kyi bdag nyid 'phags pa 'jam dpal yin par bshad
NK051(zhi)005:192: pa'i phyir / de lta bu'i yon tan brjod pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:193: de la 'phags pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na chos thams cad la khyab pa yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:197: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
NK051(zhi)005:199: sems can kun gyi yid la gnas //
NK051(zhi)005:200: shes bya ba la stsogs pa lta bu ste /
NK051(zhi)005:201: de la rnam pa bzhi'i tshul gyis khyab pa ni 'di lta ste /
NK051(zhi)005:206: de la chos nyid kyis khyab pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:207: chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi stong pa bdag med pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:209: chos kyi dbyings ni ma gtogs pa //
NK051(zhi)005:210: chos ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
NK051(zhi)005:212: de bas na chos kyi dbyings ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal te /
NK051(zhi)005:213: de'i phyir thams cad la khyab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)005:214: ye shes kyi sgo nas khyab ste /
NK051(zhi)005:215: 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi chos can ni rang rig pa tsam ste /
NK051(zhi)005:216: chos thams cad kyang rang rig pa tsam du 'dus pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:217: ye shes kyi yul du ma gyur ba'i chos nyid kyang med de /
NK051(zhi)005:218: de'i phyir ye shes kyi tshul gyis kyang khyab bo //
NK051(zhi)005:219: thugs rjes kyang khyab pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:220: 'di ltar dbyings dang ye shes zung du 'brel pa ga na ba de na /
NK051(zhi)005:221: thugs rje chen po yang rgyun mi 'chad pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:222: de bzhin du mdzad pas kyang khyab ste /
NK051(zhi)005:223: chos de gsum gang du tshogs pa der mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad do //
NK051(zhi)005:224: de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs dang sems can
NK051(zhi)005:225: rnams kyi sems la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis khyab
NK051(zhi)005:226: ste / chos de dag gang nas kyang ma 'ongs la /
NK051(zhi)005:228: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med bzhin du /
NK051(zhi)005:230: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad par nus pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:231: de lta bu'i yon tan brjod pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:232: de la 'phags pa 'jam dpal ji ltar chos thams cad du sprul pa yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:234: gzugs rnams ma lus snang ba'i dpal //
NK051(zhi)005:235: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
NK051(zhi)005:236: shes bya ba la stsogs pa ji ltar 'gro ba
NK051(zhi)005:237: 'dul ba'i dbang gis snod dang bcud du bcas pa'i
NK051(zhi)005:238: gzugs sna tshogs su sprul pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:239: gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can //
NK051(zhi)005:240: ral ba muny+dzu cod pan thogs //
NK051(zhi)005:241: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i skabs su /
NK051(zhi)005:242: brtul zhugs thams cad 'dzin par sprul ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:249: skye dgu'i bdag po la sogs pa'am /
NK051(zhi)005:250: gzhan yang mdzes pa'i gzugs sam /
NK051(zhi)005:253: gzhon pa la stsogs pa'i gzugs sam /
NK051(zhi)005:254: gzhon yang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs sam /
NK051(zhi)005:255: zag pa zad pa la stsogs pa chos thams cad
NK051(zhi)005:256: kyi gzugs brnyan du 'phags pa 'jam dpal mi 'phrul
NK051(zhi)005:257: ba med do // de bas na de lta bu'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:258: brjod pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:259: de la ji ltar na 'phags pa 'jam dpal de chos thams cad la dga' ba yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:261: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //
NK051(zhi)005:262: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
NK051(zhi)005:263: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa //
NK051(zhi)005:264: zhes bya ba la stsogs pa lta bu ste /
NK051(zhi)005:265: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dbang gis chos thams cad la dga' bar ston pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:266: snying rje'i dbang gis srid pa la chags shing dga' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:267: shes rab kyi dbang gis stong pa nyid la chags shing dga' ba ste /
NK051(zhi)005:268: de bas na de lta bu'i yon tan gyi dbang
NK051(zhi)005:269: du gsungs pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i yon tan
NK051(zhi)005:271: de la ji ltar chos thams cad mkhyen pa yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:273: shes rab chen pos skad cig la //
NK051(zhi)005:274: chos kun khong du chud pa po //
NK051(zhi)005:275: chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste //
NK051(zhi)005:276: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad du chos
NK051(zhi)005:277: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i dbang du
NK051(zhi)005:278: gsungs pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du 'gyur
NK051(zhi)005:279: ro // de la ji ltar na chos thams cad gsungs pa yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:281: smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal //
NK051(zhi)005:282: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi rgyal //
NK051(zhi)005:283: smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med //
NK051(zhi)005:284: ces bya ba la sogs te /
NK051(zhi)005:285: ji srid du chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par ston pa'i mnga' bdag yin pas /
NK051(zhi)005:286: de'i dbang du smos pa'i chos thams cad kyi ming yang de'i mtshan du 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:287: de la ji ltar na chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:290: sgrib pa las grol ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:291: nyon mongs pa zhi par byed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:293: 'khor ba'i pha rol phyin pa dang chu bo las brgal ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:294: srid rtsa bton pa la sogs pa zag pa dang
NK051(zhi)005:295: bcas pa'i chos kyi dri ma dag pa'i sgo nas
NK051(zhi)005:296: brjod pa dang / gzhan yang dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang dang /
NK051(zhi)005:297: rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang dang /
NK051(zhi)005:298: pha rol phyin bcu dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:299: shes bcu rnam dag 'chang pa la sogs te /
NK051(zhi)005:300: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang /
NK051(zhi)005:302: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid du ston te /
NK051(zhi)005:303: de ltar chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:304: ming gang smos pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:305: de la ji ltar na chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:307: chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal //
NK051(zhi)005:308: zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu chos thams cad la mnga' brnyes shing /
NK051(zhi)005:309: de la dbang bsgyur ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:312: bdag por ston pa'i sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)005:313: yon tan brjod pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:314: de la ji ltar na des chos thams cad bskyed pa yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:316: sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa po //
NK051(zhi)005:317: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pa //
NK051(zhi)005:318: sna tshogs don kun bskyed pa po //
NK051(zhi)005:319: gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa po la sogs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:320: chos thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal las byung bar ston pa lta bu ste /
NK051(zhi)005:321: 'di ltar de bzhin nyid kyi phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:322: chos thams cad bskyed pa yin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:323: thabs dang shes rab kyi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa yin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:324: 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir sprul pa thams cad bskyed pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:325: de lta bu la sogs pa yon tan brjod pa'i
NK051(zhi)005:326: phyir smos pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du
NK051(zhi)005:327: 'gyur ro // de la ji ltar na de chos thams cad las skyes pa yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:328: de chos nyid las skyes pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:329: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
NK051(zhi)005:331: de ye shes las skyes pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:332: ye shes 'ba' zhig las byung ba zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)005:333: de sems las skyes pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:334: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o de nyan thos kyi lam dang /
NK051(zhi)005:335: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang /
NK051(zhi)005:336: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam thams cad las kyang skyes pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:337: nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba //
NK051(zhi)005:339: de theg pa chen po'i yang chen po gsang sngags kyi tshul las kyang skyes pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:340: gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba //
NK051(zhi)005:342: de legs par sbyang ba'i chos las kyang skyes pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:343: chos las 'byung ba srid pa sel //
NK051(zhi)005:345: de chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid las skyes pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:346: rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)005:348: de ltar chos thams cad las skyes par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:349: de'i yon tan brjod pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:350: de ltar rnam pa bcu'i sgo nas zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang /
NK051(zhi)005:351: zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi ming thams
NK051(zhi)005:352: cad de'i mtshan du 'gyur ba thun mong du bstan
NK051(zhi)005:353: nas / da ni khyad par brjod par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:354: de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la de'i bdag nyid du ston pa'i tshe /
NK051(zhi)005:355: 'di ltar zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi
NK051(zhi)005:356: mtshan nyid ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal yin no zhes
NK051(zhi)005:357: brjod par bya'o // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan
NK051(zhi)005:358: nyid ni zag pa dang bcas pa'o zhes brjod par
NK051(zhi)005:359: brjod par bya'o // mi bya ste / dper na
NK051(zhi)005:360: bum pa'i mtshan nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid do
NK051(zhi)005:362: mi rtag pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni bum pa'o zhes brjod par mi bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:363: 'di ltar mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi rnam par bzhag pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:367: dam pa ma yin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:368: 'khrul pa dang bden pa lta bu'i sgo nas phan tshun mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhir bzhag ste /
NK051(zhi)005:369: thams cad du phan tshun bsnor du rung ba ni ma yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:370: de bas na 'phags pa 'jal dpal gyi mtshan nyid
NK051(zhi)005:371: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos yin par mtshan mi
NK051(zhi)005:372: brjod do // chos thams cad la khyab pa ston pa'i skabs su /
NK051(zhi)005:373: rten dang brten par bzhag pa'i tshe /
NK051(zhi)005:374: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la khyab pa yin gyi /
NK051(zhi)005:375: brten pa ni ma yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:376: dper na nam mkha' ni gzugs la khyab pa yin gyi /
NK051(zhi)005:377: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gzugs la brten pa ma yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:378: de bas na zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la
NK051(zhi)005:379: 'phags pa 'jam dpal brten pa'i tshul nas mtshan mi
NK051(zhi)005:380: brjod do // zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos lta bur 'phrul zhing 'jug par ston pa'i tshe /
NK051(zhi)005:381: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la thugs rje dang 'phrul pa 'jug par ston kyang /
NK051(zhi)005:382: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la ni des bsgos shing byin gyis rlobs kyi /
NK051(zhi)005:383: de la zag pa dang bcas pas mi 'dzin cing mi gos te /
NK051(zhi)005:384: dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer mi gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su shar ba'i tshe /
NK051(zhi)005:385: nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su bsgos shing reg par gyur kyang /
NK051(zhi)005:386: dri ma des 'od la bsgos shing byin gyis brlabs pa med do //
NK051(zhi)005:387: de'i phyir thams cad du 'jug kyang gos pa'i tshul nas mtshan brjod par mi bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:388: tshul de dag gis zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos
NK051(zhi)005:389: la 'phags pa 'jam dpal ldan par bsgrub pa na
NK051(zhi)005:391: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la zag pa dang bcas pa'i
NK051(zhi)005:392: phyogs ldan pa'i sgo nas mtshan brjod par ni mi
NK051(zhi)005:393: bya'o // rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas mtshan brjod pa'i tshe /
NK051(zhi)005:394: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams ni /
NK051(zhi)005:395: nyes skyon gyi chos dri ma'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:396: de bsal zhing zad par byas pa'i sgo nas mtshan brjod pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:397: zag pa med pa'i chos rnam par dag par ston pa'i tshe na /
NK051(zhi)005:398: de la mi mthun pa'i dri ma thams cad ma
NK051(zhi)005:399: lus par gtan du zad pa'i phyir rnam par dag
NK051(zhi)005:401: don dam par gnyis su med pa'i tshul nas brjod pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:402: kun rdzob tsam du de dag spang bar bya ba yin pas /
NK051(zhi)005:403: spangs shing zad pa'i tshul nas ni brjod pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:404: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos bskyed par ston pa'i tshe /
NK051(zhi)005:405: chos ci yang ma yin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:406: shes pa rang rig pa'i sgo dang 'khrul pa'i chos
NK051(zhi)005:407: sna tshogs su snang ba'i sgo nas bdag po'i rkyen
NK051(zhi)005:408: du bshad kyi / rgyu'i rkyen du mi brjod do //
NK051(zhi)005:409: de chos thams cad las skyes par bstan pa'i skabs su /
NK051(zhi)005:410: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos kyi dbang las 'phags pa 'jam dpal skye bar bshad kyi /
NK051(zhi)005:411: de'i rgyu'i rkyen yin par mi bshad de /
NK051(zhi)005:412: de bas na de dag gi sgo nas mtshan brjod par mi bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:413: zag pa med pa'i chos la khyad par du bstan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:414: de dag las bzlog pa nyid de /
NK051(zhi)005:415: zag pa med pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid can dang /
NK051(zhi)005:417: chos kyis bsgos shing byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas kyang mtshan brjod pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:418: 'di dag ni chos thams cad kyi ming 'phags pa
NK051(zhi)005:419: 'jam dpal gyi mtshan du bstan pa las brjod pa'i
NK051(zhi)005:421: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang /
NK051(zhi)005:422: zag pa med pa'i chos la thun mong du mtshan brjod du rung ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:423: bye brag gi sgo nas brjod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:424: brjod pa ma yin pa yod par bstan pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:425: 'di dag tsam gyis de'i mtshan gang dang gang rnams yin pa mdor bstan pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:426: rgyas par ni gzhung 'di nyid du bstan pa'i mtshan
NK051(zhi)005:427: rnams yan lag dang nying lag tu phye ba de'i
NK051(zhi)005:430: // da ni de yang dag par brjod pa ji ltar brjod pa'i tshul bshad par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:431: de yang rnam pa gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)005:434: mtshan yon tan gyi don du bltas te brjod pa'i tshul dang /
NK051(zhi)005:435: mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du bltas te brjod pa'i tshul dang /
NK051(zhi)005:436: mtshan gnyis su med pa'i don du bltas te brjod pa'i tshul lo //
NK051(zhi)005:437: de la mtshan yon tan gyi don du bltas te brjod pa'i tshul ji ltar brjod ce na /
NK051(zhi)005:439: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag /
NK051(zhi)005:440: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed cing /
NK051(zhi)005:441: theg pa chen po'i sgor zhugs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:442: sangs rgyas shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis /
NK051(zhi)005:443: thog ma nyid du bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni /
NK051(zhi)005:444: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen po /
NK051(zhi)005:445: de dag thams cad kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa /
NK051(zhi)005:446: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pas /
NK051(zhi)005:447: nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa sgrub cing /
NK051(zhi)005:448: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med
NK051(zhi)005:449: pa thams cad kyi re ba yongs su skong ba'i
NK051(zhi)005:451: rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi mdun na bzhugs pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:452: de bas na gang gis 'di'i mtshan brjod pa de la ni /
NK051(zhi)005:453: bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan brjod pas /
NK051(zhi)005:454: de la dper bzod pa ma yin no zhes dang ba'i dad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:455: mos pas mngon du byas te /
NK051(zhi)005:456: de yang sems can thams cad kyi don bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir brjod par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:457: zhes smon lam gyis 'phangs pa'i bsam pas /
NK051(zhi)005:458: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas mtshan brjod par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:459: de yang mos pa'i dbang gis 'di ltar yid la byed pa bzhag par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:460: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni /
NK051(zhi)005:461: 'di lta bu'i yon tan can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)005:462: thugs rje dang byams pa'i mnga' bdag pas /
NK051(zhi)005:463: rtag tu gdul bya thams cad kyi mdun na gnas pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:464: bdag gis de'i sku khyad par can mdun du yid
NK051(zhi)005:465: la byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung ste rtag
NK051(zhi)005:466: tu mdun na gnas pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:467: de la mchod pa brjod pa'i don du bsam pa g.yeng ba med pas mtshan brjod par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:468: gzhan du na bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin ni de lta bu yin mod kyi /
NK051(zhi)005:469: 'on kyang de'i sku bzang po khyad par can yid la byas na /
NK051(zhi)005:470: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la
NK051(zhi)005:471: byin gyis rlobs par 'gyur ro zhes shes par byas
NK051(zhi)005:472: nas / mdun gyi nam mkha' la rang gi yid
NK051(zhi)005:473: las sprul pa'i rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi dpag
NK051(zhi)005:474: bsam gyi shing chen po rgyas pa'i grib ma la
NK051(zhi)005:475: nas / / rin po che pad+ma'i gdan dang zla
NK051(zhi)005:476: ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jam
NK051(zhi)005:477: nas / / dpal gzhon nu / sku mdog kha ba la gur gum gtor ba lta bu /
NK051(zhi)005:478: sna tshogs kyi na bza' mnabs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:479: phyag g.yon na ut+pala sngon po rgyas pa bsnams pa /
NK051(zhi)005:480: g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa can /
NK051(zhi)005:481: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chas pa ltar rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsam ste /
NK051(zhi)005:482: de'i yon tan mngon par brjod pa'i don du /
NK051(zhi)005:483: g.yeng ba med pa'i yid la byed pas mtshan brjod par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:484: yang na sku mdog phyag mtshan ni glegs bam dang /
NK051(zhi)005:487: zla ba'i kha dog dang gser btso ma'i kha dog la sogs te /
NK051(zhi)005:488: ji ltar mos pa bzhin du yid la bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:489: mchod pa brjod pa rdzogs nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab ste /
NK051(zhi)005:490: yongs su dag pa'i zhing khams su gshegs su gsol nas ldang bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:492: 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'di ltar bsam par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:493: bcom ldan 'das nyid snga ma bzhin du bsam pa'i steng gi phyogs su /
NK051(zhi)005:494: bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa la sogs pa phyogs
NK051(zhi)005:495: bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu byung ba'i tshul
NK051(zhi)005:497: de'i g.yas kyi phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:499: spyan ras dbang phyug dang phyag na rdo rje dang /
NK051(zhi)005:502: sgrib pa rnam par sel ba la sogs te /
NK051(zhi)005:503: bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams khyim
NK051(zhi)005:504: pa'i tshul gyis rgyan ma spangs pa'i mtshan nyid du
NK051(zhi)005:506: de'i g.yon gyi phyogs su 'phags pa shwa ri'i bu dang /
NK051(zhi)005:509: kun dga' bo la sogs te /
NK051(zhi)005:510: dgra bcom pa chen po rnams rab tu byung ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs par bsam mo //
NK051(zhi)005:511: de'i 'og gi phyogs su lha'i bu dbang phyug chen
NK051(zhi)005:512: po la sogs te gtsang ma rigs kyi lha rnams
NK051(zhi)005:513: dang / tshangs pa chen po dang bcas pa'i gzugs
NK051(zhi)005:514: kyi khams na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kha dog
NK051(zhi)005:515: dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:516: brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
NK051(zhi)005:517: lha rnams kha dog sna tshogs rgyan thams cad kyis
NK051(zhi)005:519: de rnams kyi mdun du bdag gis phyag btsal ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:520: mchod pa la sogs pa'i yan lag bdun dang ldan
NK051(zhi)005:521: pa'i smon lam gyi sgo nas byang chub chen por
NK051(zhi)005:522: sems bskyed nas / de dag thams cad la mchod
NK051(zhi)005:523: pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brjod par
NK051(zhi)005:524: sems bskyed nas / bya'o // de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni /
NK051(zhi)005:525: rdo rje rin po che las grub pa'i seng ge'i khri dang /
NK051(zhi)005:527: nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung dang /
NK051(zhi)005:528: mnyam bzhag gi phyag rgya dang /
NK051(zhi)005:529: chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya can du'o //
NK051(zhi)005:530: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rin po che'i pad+ma dang /
NK051(zhi)005:531: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhabs g.yon phab pa'i skyil mo krung phyed ma dang /
NK051(zhi)005:532: rang rang gi mtshan ma dang chos zhu ba'i phyag rgya can no //
NK051(zhi)005:533: nyan thos chen po rnams ni /
NK051(zhi)005:534: rin po che'i pad+ma'i gdan la chos zhu ba'i tshul du bsam par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:535: lha'i bu rnams ni rang rang gi bzhon pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:537: yang na thams cad kyang rin po che'i khri steng na chos zhu ba'i tshul can sha dag go //
NK051(zhi)005:538: mchod pa rdzogs pa nas bshags pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:539: 'dod pa'i don gsol ba bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:540: rang rang gi zhing dang gnas su gshegs su gsol te /
NK051(zhi)005:542: spyan drangs pa ni mi dgos te bsam pa tsam
NK051(zhi)005:543: nyid kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
NK051(zhi)005:544: // de dag ni mtshan yon tan gyi don du
NK051(zhi)005:545: bltas te brjod pa'i yid la byed pa'i tshul yin
NK051(zhi)005:546: // no // yon tan nyid kyi tshul ji lta bu yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:547: pha rol du phyin pa'i tshul dang gsang sngags kyi tshul rnam pa gnyis yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:548: de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul du ni /
NK051(zhi)005:552: byang chub sems dpa' dang thun mong du gyur pa'i yon tan dang /
NK051(zhi)005:553: de bzhin gshegs pa nyag gcig gi yon tan de dag dang thun mong ma yin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)005:554: de la thun mong ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
NK051(zhi)005:555: bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:556: snyoms par 'jug pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa mngon par mtho ba'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnams dang /
NK051(zhi)005:557: gzhan yang bden pa bzhi dang /
NK051(zhi)005:559: rnam par thar pa la sogs pa dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:560: de bzhin du phyogs dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:561: dbang dang mngon par shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:562: sa dang byang chub sems dpa'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)005:563: byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:564: byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa rnams so //
NK051(zhi)005:565: thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan ni /
NK051(zhi)005:566: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
NK051(zhi)005:568: mtshan ma dang dpe byad bzang po dang /
NK051(zhi)005:570: thugs rje chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
NK051(zhi)005:571: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nyer bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
NK051(zhi)005:572: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:573: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)005:574: rnam pa thams cad mchog gi ye shes shes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu ste /
NK051(zhi)005:575: 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:576: rgya mtsho ltar zab cing rgya che ba'i phyir dpag dang tshad las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)005:577: de yang mdor bsdu na ni rnam pa bzhi yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:578: shes par bya ba'i chos thams cad ma lus par yongs su mkhyen pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:579: spang bar bya ba'i chos thams cad ma lus par gtan du spangs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:580: gnas gyur par bya ba'i chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par rtag tu gnas gyur ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:581: thob par bya ba'i chos thams cad ma lus par rtag tu thob pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:582: 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon
NK051(zhi)005:583: tan rgya mtsho mdor bsdu na rnam pa bzhi yin
NK051(zhi)005:584: no // gsang sngags kyi tshul las ni /
NK051(zhi)005:585: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rlabs chen po rnam pa gsum gsungs te /
NK051(zhi)005:587: yongs la khyab pa'i yon tan dang /
NK051(zhi)005:588: rtsis las 'das pa'i yon tan dang /
NK051(zhi)005:589: mchog tu gyur pa'i yon tan no //
NK051(zhi)005:590: de la yongs la khyab pa'i yon tan gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:591: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni /
NK051(zhi)005:592: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa //
NK051(zhi)005:593: chos kyi dbyings kyi mur thug pa'i dag pa dang ma dag pa'i zhing khams dag dang /
NK051(zhi)005:594: de dag na gnas pa'i gang zag slob pa dang mi slob pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:595: gnyis ka min pas bsdus pa'i chos rnams /
NK051(zhi)005:596: 'di ltar phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nas /
NK051(zhi)005:597: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa mchog gi ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)005:598: chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi
NK051(zhi)005:599: chos rnams la ma khyab pa med pa ni yongs
NK051(zhi)005:600: la khyab pa'i yon tan yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:601: de ji ltar khyab pa'i tshul ni mtshan bshad pa'i skabs su bshad pa lta bur shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:602: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsis las 'das pa'i yon tan gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:603: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i yon tan dang /
NK051(zhi)005:607: phrin las kyi dbang gi sgo nas yon tan du gyur pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:608: rtsa ba re re la yang yon tan gyi cha lnga lngar phye bas sku lnga dang /
NK051(zhi)005:609: de bzhin du gzhan la yang lnga lnga dang /
NK051(zhi)005:611: de bzhin du rigs nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /
NK051(zhi)005:612: de rnams la yang snying po dang /
NK051(zhi)005:615: rig sngags rnams kyi rigs kyis phye bas rigs brgya brgya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:616: de dag la yang de bzhin du phye bas /
NK051(zhi)005:617: rigs 'bum phrag brjod kyis mi langs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:618: grangs med pas rigs rgya mtsho zhes gsungs te /
NK051(zhi)005:620: rigs ni mtha' yas gsungs pa yang //
NK051(zhi)005:621: rigs chen dag tu zad par 'dus //
NK051(zhi)005:622: zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
NK051(zhi)005:624: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
NK051(zhi)005:625: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
NK051(zhi)005:627: rigs lnga dang drug dang mtha' yas pa gsungs pa yang /
NK051(zhi)005:629: gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang //
NK051(zhi)005:630: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
NK051(zhi)005:631: rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs //
NK051(zhi)005:633: 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang //
NK051(zhi)005:634: phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang //
NK051(zhi)005:635: rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas //
NK051(zhi)005:637: rdo rje'i rigs 'ba' zhig kyang mtha' yas te //
NK051(zhi)005:639: zhu ba po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i skabs su /
NK051(zhi)005:640: khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //
NK051(zhi)005:641: lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa //
NK051(zhi)005:644: ces bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje khro bo'i rigs sna tshogs gsungs pa lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)005:645: de bzhin du rigs gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:646: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)005:648: gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug /
NK051(zhi)005:649: nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston //
NK051(zhi)005:651: pad+ma'i rigs kyi dbang du gsungs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:652: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che //
NK051(zhi)005:655: rin po che'i rigs kyi dbang du gsungs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:656: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku //
NK051(zhi)005:657: byed pa dpag med 'gyed pa po //
NK051(zhi)005:659: las kyi rigs kyi dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:660: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)005:661: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
NK051(zhi)005:663: 'di lta bu'i che ba'i yon tan yongs su bgrang ba las 'das pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:664: rtsis las 'das pa'i yon tan zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:665: de la mchog tu gyur pa'i yon tan gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:666: gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni /
NK051(zhi)005:667: yongs su mthar phyin cing yongs su rdzogs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:671: dbyer mi phyed pa'i sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)005:672: rdo rjes khyad par du byas pa'i yon tan dang /
NK051(zhi)005:673: mnyam pa med pa'i sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)005:674: chen pos khyad par du byas pa'i yon tan dang /
NK051(zhi)005:675: de bzhin du rab mchog dam pa bla na med
NK051(zhi)005:676: pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas khyad par du
NK051(zhi)005:678: de bzhin du gtso bo dang /
NK051(zhi)005:681: rgyal po la sogs pas khyad par du byas pa'i yon tan dang /
NK051(zhi)005:682: gzhan yang mtha' dag dang kun dang lus pa med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:683: rtag tu la sogs pas khyad par du byas pa'i
NK051(zhi)005:684: yon tan du byas pa'i sgo nas mngon par brjod
NK051(zhi)005:685: pa rnams te / 'di ni mchog tu gyur pa'i yon tan zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:686: de lta na yon tan gyi rlabs chen po rnam pa gsum po 'di dag gis ni /
NK051(zhi)005:687: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad bsdus par shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:688: mtshan yon tan gyi don du bltas te brjod pa'i tshul rdzogs so //
NK051(zhi)005:690: // da ni mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du bltas te brjod pa'i tshul bstan par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:691: de la 'dir rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
NK051(zhi)005:692: gang la la dag thabs dang shes rab zab mo'i
NK051(zhi)005:694: gsang sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa rig
NK051(zhi)005:695: sngags dang gsang sngags yongs su mnyes pa'i sgo nas
NK051(zhi)005:696: sems can thams cad kyi don myur du bsgrub par
NK051(zhi)005:697: 'dod pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
NK051(zhi)005:698: chub myur du thob par bya ba la thabs mkhas
NK051(zhi)005:699: pa'i spyod pas thabs dang shes rab dus gcig tu
NK051(zhi)005:700: zung du 'brel ba'i lam zab mo la sbyar bar
NK051(zhi)005:701: 'dod pa rnams kyis thog ma nyid du theg pa
NK051(zhi)005:702: chen po ma nor bar ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes
NK051(zhi)005:703: gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:704: des bstan pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:706: thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sdom par gyur pa /
NK051(zhi)005:707: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa las gzhi blangs te /
NK051(zhi)005:708: byang chub chen po'i sdom pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:709: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa'ang blangs nas /
NK051(zhi)005:710: sgrub thabs kyi man ngag kyang tshul bzhin du mnos te /
NK051(zhi)005:711: de phyin chad kyang spro ba mi lhod par brtson
NK051(zhi)005:712: pa la gnas pas rnal 'byor 'di la brtson par
NK051(zhi)005:713: bya'o // de la rnal 'byor gyi rim pa ni 'di yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:714: sngags khang ngam gang yang rung ba'i gnas su rin
NK051(zhi)005:715: po che las 'bur du bskos pa'i stegs bu khru
NK051(zhi)005:716: gang ba'am / de las lhag kyang rung /
NK051(zhi)005:717: legs par byi dor byas te /
NK051(zhi)005:718: der 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sku gzugs sam /
NK051(zhi)005:719: ri mo'i gzugs 'byor na yang bzhugs su gsol /
NK051(zhi)005:721: mchod pa'i bye brag dag kyang ji ltar 'byor ba bzhin bzhag ste /
NK051(zhi)005:722: bdag nyid stan bde ba la 'dug nas thog ma nyid du nang bar sngar langs te /
NK051(zhi)005:723: sngar sdom pa mnos pa rnams zhig pa dang ma zhig pa bsam par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:724: zhig par gyur pa rnams ni bshags par rigs pa'am /
NK051(zhi)005:725: slar blang bar rigs pa dag de bzhin du bya bar bsams la /
NK051(zhi)005:726: ma zhig pa rnams ni brtan par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:727: de nas de nyid kyi shugs las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya /
NK051(zhi)005:728: sdom pa brtan por gzung pa dag kyang 'phags pa rnams kyi spyan sngar brtan par gzung bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:729: de nas 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya ba ste /
NK051(zhi)005:730: 'di ltar mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa lnga bsgom par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:731: sems can gyi khams sna tshogs gzugs brnyan lta bur gsal bar bltas nas /
NK051(zhi)005:732: de la dang por me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas sbyar bar bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:733: ji ltar me long dag pa la gzugs so sor gsal ba ltar /
NK051(zhi)005:734: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa byang chub kyi sems la /
NK051(zhi)005:735: sems can gyi khams sna tshogs gzugs brnyan lta bur gsal bar bltas nas /
NK051(zhi)005:736: de dag gi don gyi phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:737: sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:738: de nas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la sbyar bar bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:739: chos kun rang bzhin dag pas na //
NK051(zhi)005:740: bdag kyang rang bzhin rnam par dag /
NK051(zhi)005:742: chos thams cad bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:743: de nas a k+aa ro mu kham sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma n+aam +aa t+ya nut+pan+na t+wota /
NK051(zhi)005:744: ces sngags brjod pas chos thams cad bdag med par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid /
NK051(zhi)005:745: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes chos la dmigs pa'i
NK051(zhi)005:746: snying rje chen po gong du bstan pa'i mnyam pa
NK051(zhi)005:747: nyid kyi ye shes kyi stobs kyis bskyed pa bsgom
NK051(zhi)005:748: par bya'o // de nas de ma thag tu shin
NK051(zhi)005:749: tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
NK051(zhi)005:750: shes gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las rnam par grol
NK051(zhi)005:751: ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba /
NK051(zhi)005:752: mi dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po dang /
NK051(zhi)005:753: rjes su mthun par sgom par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:754: de nas sems can gyi don du bya ba dang bral ba rigs pa ma yin pas /
NK051(zhi)005:755: sngon gyi smon lam dang sems can gyi dbang las gyur pa /
NK051(zhi)005:756: mi dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes mngon du bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:757: de nas byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis kyi
NK051(zhi)005:758: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu thabs dang shes rab zung
NK051(zhi)005:760: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid la mngon du 'jug par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:761: de la dang po nyid du nam mkha'i dkyil du +aa li dang k+aa li'i bdag nyid /
NK051(zhi)005:762: sgyu 'phrul gyi tshul rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar skar ma dang 'dra bar bsams te /
NK051(zhi)005:763: de yongs su gyur pa las yi ge h'u chen
NK051(zhi)005:764: po kun tu bzang po byang chub sems kyi rang
NK051(zhi)005:765: bzhin kha dog sngon po 'od kyi phreng ba can
NK051(zhi)005:766: / khro bo 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs par bsgom ste /
NK051(zhi)005:767: de'i 'od zer gyi rtse mo las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sprul te /
NK051(zhi)005:768: zhing khams thams cad du gshegs nas /
NK051(zhi)005:769: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phrul bas don gyi bya ba
NK051(zhi)005:770: byas te slar log nas h'u nyid la zhugs pas
NK051(zhi)005:771: de las gyur pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje chen
NK051(zhi)005:773: de yang sgo drug dang ldan pa kha dog drug
NK051(zhi)005:774: dang ldan pa sgo drug na mngon par dga' ba
NK051(zhi)005:775: la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams drug gnas
NK051(zhi)005:776: pa / de'i 'bar ba'i gzi brjid kyis zhing khams
NK051(zhi)005:777: thams cad du khyab pas bdud thams cad kyi lta
NK051(zhi)005:778: bas thug mi thub pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje
NK051(zhi)005:779: rtse lnga pa bsgom par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:780: de'i bum pa'i nang du yi ge b+h+r+aum dmar po
NK051(zhi)005:781: las gyur pa'i rin po che bzhi las grub pa'i
NK051(zhi)005:782: mchod rten stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
NK051(zhi)005:783: gyi khams kyi tshad tsam bsgoms nas /
NK051(zhi)005:784: de'i nang du yi ge h+r+aihls chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum dkar po 'greng bur gnas pa /
NK051(zhi)005:785: de'i nang du yi ge a las rdo rje rgya
NK051(zhi)005:786: gram des sa gzhi rdo rje dkar po byin gyis
NK051(zhi)005:787: brlab bo // de'i steng du yi ge h'u las
NK051(zhi)005:788: rdo rje nor bu rin po che brtsegs pa'i gzhal
NK051(zhi)005:789: yas khang rnam par bsgom mo //
NK051(zhi)005:791: dpal de nyid 'dus pa la stsogs par gsungs pa'i
NK051(zhi)005:792: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bsgom par
NK051(zhi)005:793: bya'o // de'i dbus kyi gdan la yi ge a
NK051(zhi)005:794: las yongs su bskyed pa'i rnam par snang mdzad chen
NK051(zhi)005:795: po sku mdog dkar po kun tu zhal gyi mtshan
NK051(zhi)005:796: nyid ral ba'i dbu rgyan can /
NK051(zhi)005:797: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can te /
NK051(zhi)005:799: de'i thugs kar yi ge d+h+aihls bskyed pa'i 'jam dpal
NK051(zhi)005:800: dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga gtsug phud lnga dang
NK051(zhi)005:801: ldan pa kha dog lnga dang ldan pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:806: dbu'i steng na gnas pa'i zhal zhi ba dkar po byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
NK051(zhi)005:808: sna tshogs kyi na bza' mnabs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:810: bzhi na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK051(zhi)005:811: stong phrag brgya pa glegs bam bzhir bgos te thugs
NK051(zhi)005:812: kar 'dzin pa / gzhan gyis shes rab kyi ral gri 'dzin pa bsgom par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:813: gdan gyi sangs rgyas dang 'og nas ston pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rnams ni /
NK051(zhi)005:814: mos pa'i dbang gis rigs so sor bsgyur bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:816: dang po'i sangs rgyas de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:817: de yang a las skyes pa kha dog drug dang ldan pa rtsibs drug pa /
NK051(zhi)005:818: phyi dang nang du mu khyud bzhi dang ldan pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:819: de'i lte ba'i dkyil du yi ge a bsam par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:820: de'i phyi rim gyi mu khyud dang po la 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags /
NK051(zhi)005:825: badz+ra a +aa am ahrnamasa 'god par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:826: de'i phyi rim gyi mu khyud gnyis pa la sgra yig bcu gnyis 'god par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:827: de'i phyi rol gyi rtsibs rnams la 'di ltar /
NK051(zhi)005:829: badz+ra t+aik+sh+n+aa ya te na mah gnyis pa la /
NK051(zhi)005:830: duhkha ts+tshe d+aa ya te na mah gsum pa la /
NK051(zhi)005:831: pradz+ny+aa dz+ny+aa na m+aur+t+aa ya te na mah bzhi pa la /
NK051(zhi)005:832: dz+ny+aa na k+aa ya ya te na mah lnga pa la /
NK051(zhi)005:833: w+aa g+ai shwa ri ya te na mah drug pa la /
NK051(zhi)005:834: a ra pa tsa na ya te na mah de'i phyi'i mu khyud dang po la /
NK051(zhi)005:835: a +aa sarba ta th+aa ga ta hri da ya ha ra ha ra /
NK051(zhi)005:838: w+aa g+ai sh+aa ra ma h+aa p+aa tsa /
NK051(zhi)005:842: d+har+m+m+aa d+h+aa tu dz+ny+aa na gar+b+ha +aah phyi rol gyi mu khyud gnyis pa la /
NK051(zhi)005:843: ka kha la sogs pa'i sa ha'i mthar thug pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum 'god par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:844: mu khyud bzhi'i yi ge ni kha dog dkar po'o //
NK051(zhi)005:845: rtsibs drug gi yi ge ni rigs drug gi kha dog gi rim pa bzhin no //
NK051(zhi)005:846: 'khor lo'i dbus kyi yi ge a las bskyed pa
NK051(zhi)005:847: bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' ston ka'i zla
NK051(zhi)005:848: ba'i mdog can in+t+ra ni la'i mdog gi gtsug phud
NK051(zhi)005:849: nyi ma shar ga'i dkyil ltar 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
NK051(zhi)005:850: gyis bskor ba / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
NK051(zhi)005:851: kyi rgyan gyi dngos po'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan
NK051(zhi)005:852: gyis bskor ba / pa / sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan
NK051(zhi)005:853: la bzhugs pa phyag gnyis kyis ut+pala dmar po dang
NK051(zhi)005:855: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis gnas pa 'dzin pa /
NK051(zhi)005:856: zhi ba'i tshul dang ldan par bdag nyid bsam ste /
NK051(zhi)005:857: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas /
NK051(zhi)005:858: de'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin /
NK051(zhi)005:859: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rkyen /
NK051(zhi)005:860: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad skye ba'i dngos po /
NK051(zhi)005:861: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi dngos po /
NK051(zhi)005:863: yi ge thams cad kyi rkyen yi ge a bsgom par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:864: de nas ji skad bstan pa'i yi ge a rnams kyang shin tu 'od gsal bar bsgom ste /
NK051(zhi)005:865: sgrib pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'i 'od des rang gi lus la snang bar byas te /
NK051(zhi)005:866: de nas zhal bzhi las byung nas /
NK051(zhi)005:867: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten snang bar byas /
NK051(zhi)005:868: de nas rdo rje sgo drug nas 'od zer kha dog drug tu byung ste /
NK051(zhi)005:869: nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu sems can gyi don byas /
NK051(zhi)005:870: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te slar log
NK051(zhi)005:871: nas ye shes kyi rdo rje la lan gsum bskor
NK051(zhi)005:873: shes rab ye shes de drangs nas chos bdag med pa nyid kyis rang gi sgo nas btsud nas /
NK051(zhi)005:874: rang gi snying kha'i zla ba la gnas pa'i yi
NK051(zhi)005:875: ge dang gcig tu gyur nas gnas par bsgom par
NK051(zhi)005:876: bya'o // de yang dmigs pa gsum gyi sgo nas rjes su dran par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:877: 'di ltar ye shes kyi sku'i sgo nas dmigs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:878: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas dmigs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:879: yi ge a'i sgo nas dmigs pa rnams kyis sangs
NK051(zhi)005:880: rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku dang lhan cig
NK051(zhi)005:881: tu gnas pa yang mngon du byas nas mtshan brjod
NK051(zhi)005:882: par bya'o // rigs so sor phye ba'i 'khor lo rnams ni 'dir ma bshad do //
NK051(zhi)005:883: de ltar mtshan brjod pa la zhugs te /
NK051(zhi)005:884: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)005:886: ya te na mah zhes pa'i sngags kyi bar du
NK051(zhi)005:887: ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis gdon par bya ste
NK051(zhi)005:888: / dmigs pa gzhan bsam mi dgos so //
NK051(zhi)005:890: zhes bya ba nas bzung ste /
NK051(zhi)005:891: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)005:892: ces pa'i bar du mtshan gyi sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod pas /
NK051(zhi)005:893: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gtogs pa'i
NK051(zhi)005:894: rtsa ba'i lha sum cu rtsa bdun bskal pa bzang
NK051(zhi)005:895: po'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dang bcas pa
NK051(zhi)005:896: / rang rang gi sku mdog phyag mtshan du ldan par phyungs te /
NK051(zhi)005:897: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad du spros nas /
NK051(zhi)005:898: mdzad pa nye bar bsgrubs te /
NK051(zhi)005:899: slar log nas rang rang gi rigs ji lta bar gyur te /
NK051(zhi)005:900: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rang rang
NK051(zhi)005:901: gi gnas su rang rang gdan la bzhugs par bsgom
NK051(zhi)005:903: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
NK051(zhi)005:905: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
NK051(zhi)005:907: tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lnga rkang pa gcig gis ma tshang ba brjod pas /
NK051(zhi)005:908: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i yi ge a las /
NK051(zhi)005:909: mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge brgya brgyad cu rtsa lnga rnams spros te /
NK051(zhi)005:910: de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po la sogs pa'i sku mdog dkar po /
NK051(zhi)005:911: 'khor lo dang ral gri la sogs pa 'dzin par gyur pa phyung ste /
NK051(zhi)005:912: phyung nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad
NK051(zhi)005:913: du song nas rang gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo
NK051(zhi)005:914: nas / gti mug la gnas pa'i sems can rnams dag par bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:915: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang snang bar byas nas /
NK051(zhi)005:917: mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge 'bru rnams su gyur nas /
NK051(zhi)005:918: dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtsa ba'i lha sum cu rtsa bdun la /
NK051(zhi)005:919: mtshan gyi sngags lnga lnga thim ste /
NK051(zhi)005:921: de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed /
NK051(zhi)005:923: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)005:924: ces pa'i bar du tshigs bcad bcu /
NK051(zhi)005:925: rkang pa gcig gis lhag pa brjod pas /
NK051(zhi)005:926: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i yi ge las mtshan gyi gsang sngags bdun cu rtsa gcig 'phros pas /
NK051(zhi)005:927: 'jig rten gsum gyi gdug pa 'dul ba'i don du
NK051(zhi)005:928: rgyud thams cad las gsungs pa'i rdo rje khro bo'i
NK051(zhi)005:929: tshogs / rab tu 'bar ba'i zhal mi bzad pa dang ldan pa /
NK051(zhi)005:930: rdo rje 'bar ba me 'bar ba'i phyag phyag mtshan
NK051(zhi)005:931: gyis mtshan pa du ma'i mdog dang rgyan dang gos
NK051(zhi)005:932: gyon pa'i khro bo'i sku byung nas /
NK051(zhi)005:933: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sdang ba thams cad 'dul bar bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:934: sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar byas te /
NK051(zhi)005:935: slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyir rol du /
NK051(zhi)005:936: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la mtshan gyi yi ge'i tshogs
NK051(zhi)005:937: bdun cu rtsa gcig rnams rang rang gi rigs dang
NK051(zhi)005:938: kha dog dang gzugs rnams su gyur te /
NK051(zhi)005:939: de lta bu'i rim pas gnas par bsam mo //
NK051(zhi)005:940: de yang bcu bzhi phrag lngar bgos te /
NK051(zhi)005:941: rigs lnga'i bdag nyid kyis gnas par mos par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:943: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
NK051(zhi)005:947: tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis brjod pas /
NK051(zhi)005:948: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i yi ge las /
NK051(zhi)005:949: mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga phyung ste /
NK051(zhi)005:950: de la bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi 'phrul pas sems can ji ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du /
NK051(zhi)005:951: kha cig la tshangs pa la stsogs pa'i gzugs kyis
NK051(zhi)005:952: kha cig la nyan thos la stsogs pa'i gzugs kyis
NK051(zhi)005:953: / kha cig la byang chub sems dpa' dang /
NK051(zhi)005:954: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis /
NK051(zhi)005:955: de bzhin du kha cig la bum pa bzang po dang /
NK051(zhi)005:956: sman chen po la sogs te g.yo ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:957: mi g.yo ba'i dngos po rnams su sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas te /
NK051(zhi)005:958: rang gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas 'dod chags
NK051(zhi)005:959: la spyod pa'i sems can gyi don bya ba dang
NK051(zhi)005:960: / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang snang bar byas te
NK051(zhi)005:961: slar log nas gsang sngags kyi yi ge'i tshogs rnams
NK051(zhi)005:962: / su gyur te / rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil
NK051(zhi)005:963: 'khor chen po'i phyi rol 'khor lo gsum pa la
NK051(zhi)005:964: 'di lta bu'i rim pas rnam par gnas par mngon
NK051(zhi)005:965: / su gyur te / du bya'o // rigs kyi
NK051(zhi)005:966: dbye ba ni rigs re re la mtshan gyi sngags
NK051(zhi)005:967: kyi yi ge'i tshogs lnga bcu rtsa lngar sbyar bar
NK051(zhi)005:968: / su gyur te / du bya'o // bya'o // 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:970: nor bu chen po rin chen tog /
NK051(zhi)005:971: ces bya ba'i bar du tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa bzhi brjod pas /
NK051(zhi)005:972: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i yi ge las mtshan
NK051(zhi)005:973: gyi sngags kyi tshig brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi phyung
NK051(zhi)005:974: ste / bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i ting
NK051(zhi)005:975: nge 'dzin gyis phyogs bcu mtha' yas par gshegs nas
NK051(zhi)005:976: ste / / rang gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo
NK051(zhi)005:977: nas sems can rnams kyi ser sna bcom pa dang
NK051(zhi)005:978: ste / / / sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba byas te /
NK051(zhi)005:979: slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo bzhi pa la /
NK051(zhi)005:980: rang rang gi kha dog gi yi ge rnams su
NK051(zhi)005:981: gyur te go rim ji lta ba bzhin du rnam
NK051(zhi)005:982: par gzhag go // 'di nyid rigs kyi dbye ba ni rigs re re la /
NK051(zhi)005:983: mtshan nyi shu rtsa lnga lngar sbyar bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:984: de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
NK051(zhi)005:986: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)005:987: ces bya ba'i bar du tshigs su bcad pa bco lnga brjod pas /
NK051(zhi)005:988: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i yi ge las mtshan
NK051(zhi)005:989: gyi sngags kyi tshig dgu bcu rtsa lnga phyung ste
NK051(zhi)005:990: / bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'i tshul gyis
NK051(zhi)005:991: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs
NK051(zhi)005:993: rang gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas sems can rnams kyi le lo med par byas te /
NK051(zhi)005:994: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang gsal bar byas nas slar log ste /
NK051(zhi)005:995: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol gyi 'khor lo lnga pa la /
NK051(zhi)005:996: ji lta ba'i rim par rnam par gnas par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:998: 'dir rigs re re la bcu dgu yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:999: rigs kyi dbye ba 'di ni sprul pa spro ba'i
NK051(zhi)005:1000: dus na yang 'di lta bu'i dbye bas spro ba
NK051(zhi)005:1001: yin la / slar bsdus te 'khor lo bkod pa'i dus na yang /
NK051(zhi)005:1002: rigs kyi dbye bas gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1003: de nas mchog sbyin rdo rje la sogs pas bstod par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1004: sar+b+ba d+har+m+m+aa la sogs pa'i sngags ni gong du bkod pa nyid do //
NK051(zhi)005:1005: de nas la sogs pa ni rjes su yi rang ba'i bstod pa'i tshig go //
NK051(zhi)005:1006: yon tan brjod pa rnams kyang brjod par bya la yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1007: de nas cung zad yid brtan par byas nas /
NK051(zhi)005:1008: gong du ji ltar 'byor ba bzhin nye bar bsdogs pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs dbul bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1009: bshags pa dang 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba yang bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1010: bya ba rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po de dag kyang rim pa bzhin bsdus te /
NK051(zhi)005:1011: de ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i yi ge la bsdu bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1012: de nas lus bsrung ba bya ste ci bder gnas par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1013: tshul 'di ni yongs su rgyas pa'i bsam gtan yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1014: shin tu yongs su rgyas pa yi ni 'khor lo bdun bsgom pa'i tshul yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1017: brtson 'grus dang blo gros dang ldan pas bsgrub par
NK051(zhi)005:1018: bya ba yin pa'i phyir rgya che ba yin te
NK051(zhi)005:1019: / de mi nus pa'i gang zag mos pa'am /
NK051(zhi)005:1020: brtson 'grus sam blo gros dman pa rnams kyi don gyi phyir bsam gtan bsdus pa bstan par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1021: de la gsang sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod par 'dod cing /
NK051(zhi)005:1022: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mtshan brjod pa'i sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)005:1023: bsod nams dang ye shes 'phel bar bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1024: dngos grub la nye bar bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1025: sems can gyi don bya bar 'dod pa yod la /
NK051(zhi)005:1026: ji skad bstan pa'i bsam gtan rgya che ba ni mi nus pa'i spro ba med pa rnams kyis /
NK051(zhi)005:1028: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rjes la /
NK051(zhi)005:1029: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du /
NK051(zhi)005:1030: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i mtshan brjod par bya'o snyam du bsams te mtshan brjod par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1037: am +aah zhes brjod pas chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1038: ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1039: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar bsgom mo //
NK051(zhi)005:1041: s+thi to hri di dz+ny+aa na m+aurti ra ham bud+d+ho bud+d+ha n+aam /
NK051(zhi)005:1044: nga ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs la gnas pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1045: ye shes kyi sku'i sangs rgyas so zhes chos kyi sku'i nga rgyal du gnas par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1047: badz+ra t+aik+sh+n+aa zhes bya ba la stsogs pa'i gsang sngags brjod pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1048: bcom ldan 'das rigs drug gi rang bzhin can phyag
NK051(zhi)005:1049: rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi sku rab tu bsgom
NK051(zhi)005:1051: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
NK051(zhi)005:1052: rdo rje zla ba'i dri med 'od //
NK051(zhi)005:1053: ces bya ba kun tu bzang po'i byang chub sems 'bras bu'i ngo bo /
NK051(zhi)005:1054: sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa de nyid de ltar gyur bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1055: de yang thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1056: g.ya' gayo'am rtsegs ma ji ltar bde ba bsgom par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1060: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
NK051(zhi)005:1061: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1062: nyi ma dang zla ba de dag re re'i steng
NK051(zhi)005:1063: du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag
NK051(zhi)005:1064: nyid / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rkyen /
NK051(zhi)005:1065: 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi gzhi /
NK051(zhi)005:1066: yig 'bru thams cad kyi snying po /
NK051(zhi)005:1067: yi ge a re re bsam ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1068: de las mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che /
NK051(zhi)005:1070: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)005:1071: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1072: gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po yi ge a
NK051(zhi)005:1073: de dag las mtshan gyi gsang sngags kyi yi ge'i
NK051(zhi)005:1074: tshogs rnams kyi 'od zer rab tu 'phro bas /
NK051(zhi)005:1075: bdag kyang rab tu snang bar byed /
NK051(zhi)005:1076: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don rab tu byed cing /
NK051(zhi)005:1077: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa yang snang bar byed pa bsgom par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1078: de nas mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud /
NK051(zhi)005:1080: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)005:1081: rigs drug gi rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa'i bsam pas brjod par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1082: sar+b+ba d+har+m+m+aa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
NK051(zhi)005:1084: am ah zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsang sngags brjod pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1085: bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te /
NK051(zhi)005:1087: rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pa'i tshul gyis /
NK051(zhi)005:1088: mnyes par 'gyur ba'i bsam pas brjod par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1089: pra kri ta pa ri shud+d+ha zhes bya ba nas /
NK051(zhi)005:1091: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis brjod pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1092: bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku yongs su gzung bar dam bca' zhing khas len pa'i tshig ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1093: de bas na de dag brjod cing de bzhin du
NK051(zhi)005:1094: yongs su gzung ngo snyam du yid la bsam par
NK051(zhi)005:1095: bya'o // sar+b+ba ta th+aa ga ta hri da ya /
NK051(zhi)005:1097: dz+ny+aa na gar+b+ha +aah zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags ni
NK051(zhi)005:1098: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba'i sngags
NK051(zhi)005:1099: yin te / de bas na de brjod cing /
NK051(zhi)005:1100: phreng ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pa'i sgo nas bsnyen par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1101: de nas 'byor na mchod pa yang phul te /
NK051(zhi)005:1103: lha'i ting nge 'dzin kyang chos skye ba med pa'i ngang du bsdus te ldang bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1104: mjug phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la rjes su yi rang bas bstod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1105: yon tan gyi tshogs brjod pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1106: bsam gtan gyi yul du gsungs pa ma yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1107: brjod pa ni gang zag rnams kyis phan yon shes par bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1108: de nyid kyi brjod par bya ba yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1109: bsod nams kyi tshogs 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)005:1110: mtshan gsang sngags kyi tshul du brjod pa'i tshul bstan pa rdzogs so //
NK051(zhi)005:1112: // de la mtshan gnyis su med pa'i don du bltas te brjod pa'i tshul gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:1113: 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag /
NK051(zhi)005:1114: theg pa chen po'i don tshul zab mo'i sgo nas spyod par 'dod cing /
NK051(zhi)005:1115: bdag nyid sgrib pa thams cad dang myur du bral bar 'dod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1116: ji ltar me long dag pa la gzugs brnyan thams cad snang ba bzhin /
NK051(zhi)005:1117: sems can rnams kyi don du /
NK051(zhi)005:1118: sangs rgyas kyi chos sna tshogs snang bar 'dod pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1119: bcom ldan 'das 'jal dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1120: mngon par brjod cing nan tan du brjod pa'i sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)005:1121: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rgyud la bskyed par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1122: de la ji ltar na mtshan brjod pas gnyis su
NK051(zhi)005:1123: med pa'i ye shes bskyed par 'gyur ba yin zhe
NK051(zhi)005:1124: na / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1125: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pa gsungs pa thams cad kyang /
NK051(zhi)005:1126: phan pa dang bden pa ston pa kho na tsam yin par shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1127: de yang phan pa ni bden pa'i dbang gis 'grub pa yin la /
NK051(zhi)005:1128: bden pa yang phan pas na bden par 'grub ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1129: las dang bya ba gnyis kyang bdag nyid tha dad med do //
NK051(zhi)005:1130: de bas na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang gis phan pa ji snyed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1131: bden pa ji snyed pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1134: chos gnyis su med pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1135: de ltar yang gzhan las gsungs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1136: chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis so //
NK051(zhi)005:1138: 'di nyid las yon tan gyi skabs nas kyang /
NK051(zhi)005:1139: mtshan gzung ba chos gnyis su med par 'dzin pa yin par gsungs te /
NK051(zhi)005:1140: de bas na de ltar shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1142: bden pa gang yin pa de phan pa yin na /
NK051(zhi)005:1143: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi bden pa lta bu ji ltar phan pa'i bdag nyid can yin /
NK051(zhi)005:1144: phan pa gang yin pa de bden pa yin na /
NK051(zhi)005:1145: mu stegs legs skyong gi rig byed kyi phan pa lta bu ji ltar bden par yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:1147: de bzhin gshegs pas gsung ba'i phan pa gang ji snyed pa ni bden pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1148: bden pa la phan pa yang de bzhin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1149: 'di ltar sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi bden pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1152: stong pa la sogs pa'i rnam par bden par gsungs pa yin la /
NK051(zhi)005:1153: de la de ltar dmigs shing sgom par byas pas ni phan par 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:1154: gnod pa'i mtshan nyid ni rtag pa dang bde ba
NK051(zhi)005:1155: dang bdag la sogs pa'i rnam par bltas pas yin
NK051(zhi)005:1156: te / mi bden pa'i phyir bslus pa zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1157: mu stegs legs skyong rnams kyi phan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1158: de ba zhin gshegs pa'i gsungs pa'i phan par grags pa yang ma yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1159: 'on kyang phan pa de yang bden pa'i don las 'das pa yang ma yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1161: de ltar grub pas mtshan yang dag par brjod pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1162: gnyis su med pa'i don brjod pa la ji ltar phan par 'gyur zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:1164: 'di ltar rgyal ba rnams kyi bka' mtha' dag /
NK051(zhi)005:1165: phan pa dang bden pa ston pa kho na tsam yin la /
NK051(zhi)005:1166: phan pa dang bden pa'ang bdag nyid gcig pa'i phyir gnyis su bstan du med do //
NK051(zhi)005:1167: phan pa dang bden pa thams cad kyi dngos gzhi
NK051(zhi)005:1168: dang snying por gyur pa'ang chos gnyis su med pa
NK051(zhi)005:1169: yin te / de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
NK051(zhi)005:1170: kyi yon tan gyi mtshan gang ci brjod kyang rung
NK051(zhi)005:1171: yin te / ste / de dag thams cad kyi brjod bya ni chos kyi sku yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1172: de ltar na chos gnyis su med pa khong du chud cing yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:1173: mtshan brjod par bya'o zhes shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1174: don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba yang /
NK051(zhi)005:1175: tshul 'di nyid las gsungs pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1176: de la chos gnyis su med pa rgyud la bskyed
NK051(zhi)005:1177: pa'i don du mtshan brjod par mtshan nyid gcig mod
NK051(zhi)005:1178: kyi / gdul bya'i dbang gi sgo nas tha dad de /
NK051(zhi)005:1179: de bas na 'dir sgo gsum du shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1181: chos gnyis su med par rtogs pas zag pa'i rgyu mi skye bar bya ba'i tshul dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1182: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pas zag pa'i 'bras bu 'dzag pa'i zag pa bzlog pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1183: rgyu dang bcas pa ldog par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i tshul dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1184: mnyam pa chen po'i blos rgyu 'bras kyi sgo dbyer
NK051(zhi)005:1185: med par rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bsam pa
NK051(zhi)005:1186: lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i tshul lo //
NK051(zhi)005:1187: de la rgyu nas zad par bya ba'i tshul ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1188: mtshan brjod pas chos gnyis su med pa'i yon tan brjod par mos par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1191: yid ches pa'i dad pa bskyed par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1192: de'i stobs kyis chos gnyis su med pa dang mthun pa'i dad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1196: shes rab rnams rgyud la skye bar 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:1197: de'i stobs kyis bdag dang bdag gir lta ba ldog go //
NK051(zhi)005:1198: bdag tu mi lta na rnam par mi rtog go //
NK051(zhi)005:1199: de'i dbang gis mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing nyams su mi myong mngon par mi zhen to //
NK051(zhi)005:1200: de'i dbang gis mi chags mi len te /
NK051(zhi)005:1201: de ltar na sdug bsngal mngon par sbyor ba'i gnas med do //
NK051(zhi)005:1202: de bas na chos gnyis su med par goms par byas pas yang dang yang du goms par byas /
NK051(zhi)005:1203: shin tu goms par byas pas ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1204: zag pa ma lus bzad par 'gyur te /
NK051(zhi)005:1205: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid du 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:1206: de bskyed pa'i thabs ni mtshan brjod pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1207: 'di ltar bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis dus gcig tu bskyed par 'gyur te /
NK051(zhi)005:1208: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1209: sems can la phan pa brjod pa yin pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:1211: chos gnyis su med pa'i don bden pa brjod pa yin zhing /
NK051(zhi)005:1212: gnyis su med pa rgyud la bskyed pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:1214: de bas na pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la
NK051(zhi)005:1215: mos pa'i gang zag ye shes kyi tshogs la lhur
NK051(zhi)005:1216: blangs pas / bsod nams kyi tshogs zhar la bskyed par 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang /
NK051(zhi)005:1217: 'di lta bu yid la byed pa dang ldan pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1218: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems pa'i don dam pa'i /
NK051(zhi)005:1219: mtshan yang dag par brjod cing yid la bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1220: 'di nyid las kyang skabs dang po nyid du /
NK051(zhi)005:1221: gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing //
NK051(zhi)005:1222: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang //
NK051(zhi)005:1223: mi skye chos can 'di gsungs pa //
NK051(zhi)005:1224: zhes dam bca' ba mdzad nas /
NK051(zhi)005:1226: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung //
NK051(zhi)005:1227: a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)005:1228: don chen yi ge dam pa ste //
NK051(zhi)005:1229: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
NK051(zhi)005:1230: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
NK051(zhi)005:1231: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog /
NK051(zhi)005:1232: ces chos gnyis su med pa'i don 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yin par bstan pa'i sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)005:1233: mtshan brjod par zhal gyis bzhes te gsungs kyi /
NK051(zhi)005:1234: don gzhan skabs phye ste ma gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)005:1235: mjug tu yang rtsa ba'i sngags dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1236: gzung bar dam bca' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1237: phreng ba'i sngags kyi skabs su /
NK051(zhi)005:1238: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag
NK051(zhi)005:1239: pa mthong bar bya ba la a bzhis byin gyis
NK051(zhi)005:1240: brlabs pa ni / rtsa ba'i sngags so //
NK051(zhi)005:1241: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa gzung bar bya ba la /
NK051(zhi)005:1242: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
NK051(zhi)005:1243: sku 'jam dpal yongs su dag pa brjod pa khas
NK051(zhi)005:1244: len pa ni gzung bar dam bca' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1245: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku /
NK051(zhi)005:1246: chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1247: shin tu yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po /
NK051(zhi)005:1248: a gnyis kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1249: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs phrog pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1250: sgrib pa thams cad bsreg pa ni phreng ba'i sngags yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1251: de bas na 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
NK051(zhi)005:1252: chos gnyis su med pa'i mtshan brjod pa tsam ma gtogs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1254: de la shes rab chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1255: chos gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:1256: khu ba'i zag pa bzlog pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1257: nyon mongs pa'i zag pa yang zad par 'gyur zhing /
NK051(zhi)005:1258: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes myur du rgyud la skye bar bya ba'i thabs gsungs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1259: bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brjod pa gsungs te /
NK051(zhi)005:1260: 'di ltar 'di'i dbu zhabs ni ye shes drug gi mtshan brjod pa yin la /
NK051(zhi)005:1261: ye shes drug kyang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1262: 'di ltar gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de ni me long lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1263: 'di ltar dri ma thams cad yongs su dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1264: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang bar 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:1265: de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1266: bdag tu lta ba'i gnas med pas stobs dang ma
NK051(zhi)005:1267: 'dres pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rin po che'i
NK051(zhi)005:1269: de ni so sor rtog pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1270: mtshan mar 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral bas /
NK051(zhi)005:1271: chos thams cad ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa
NK051(zhi)005:1272: thams cad mkhyen pa dang ston pa'i gnas su gyur
NK051(zhi)005:1273: pa'o // de ni bya ba grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1275: thugs rje dang mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1276: de ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1277: thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)005:1278: ye shes lnga dbyer med pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1279: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te //
NK051(zhi)005:1280: de ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' 'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1281: de ni dam pa'i yi ge'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1283: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1285: bde ba chen po la sogs par brjod pa yang de yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1286: de bzhin du mtshan ji snyed par brjod pa yang tshig gi don de nyid yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1287: de dag nye bar ston pa 'di nyid las /
NK051(zhi)005:1288: don chen yi ge dam pa ste //
NK051(zhi)005:1290: de 'dir dam pa'i yi ge'i sgra ni zag pa med pa'i ye shes la bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1291: zag pa de yang 'dir khams bcu'i bdag nyid can /
NK051(zhi)005:1292: gzugs kyi phung po dbang dang bcas pa de'i bdag nyid kyi sa bon zhes 'dod de /
NK051(zhi)005:1293: de yang 'dod pa'i srid pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1295: gzugs med pa'i srid pa dag la go rim gyis gnas so zhes 'dod do //
NK051(zhi)005:1297: gzugs dbang dang bcas pa'i zag pa bzlog pas sems
NK051(zhi)005:1298: las byung ba'i zag pa ji ltar bzlog ce na
NK051(zhi)005:1299: / de ni 'di ltar sems dang sems las byung
NK051(zhi)005:1300: ba gang la gzugs kyii dri ma ni yongs su
NK051(zhi)005:1301: / dag la / ming bzhi'i dri ma ni yongs
NK051(zhi)005:1302: su ma dag go zhes bya ba ni mi srid
NK051(zhi)005:1303: / dag la / la / de bzhin du ming
NK051(zhi)005:1304: bzhi'i dri ma dag nas gzugs kyi dri ma dag
NK051(zhi)005:1306: 'on kyang gzugs ni cher rags shing gnas pa dang dmigs par gyur pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1307: 'di nyid kyi dri ma sngon la gzhom par bya ba yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1308: 'di nyid bcom pas thams cad kyi dag par 'gyur ba'i thabs yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1309: dper na ljon shing gi rtse mo bcad cing gshags
NK051(zhi)005:1310: te mngon par skye ba'i gnas med par byas na
NK051(zhi)005:1311: rtsa ba yang myur du med par 'gyur la /
NK051(zhi)005:1312: phra mos kyang phan gnod byed par yang mi 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:1313: de bzhin du zag pa 'bras bu nas bzlog na rgyu yang myur du zad par 'gyur la /
NK051(zhi)005:1314: phra mos kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)005:1315: de bas na thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyi yul ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1316: 'bras bu nas bzlog pa 'di gsungs par shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1317: thabs dang shes rab zab mo'i tshul 'di thun mong du ma bstan pa'i dgongs pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1318: thabs dang shes rab zhan pa rnams la nyes pa
NK051(zhi)005:1319: rgyu'i dus na ma bzlog na 'bras bu mngon du
NK051(zhi)005:1320: smin pa'i dus na bzlog pa'i thabs med pa'i dbang
NK051(zhi)005:1322: de bas na 'dir 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni ye
NK051(zhi)005:1323: shes drug gi bdag nyid dam pa'i yi ge zhes
NK051(zhi)005:1324: bya ba'i sgras bstan pa zag pa lnga yongs su
NK051(zhi)005:1326: bde ba chen po'i sku bde ba'i ye shes skad
NK051(zhi)005:1327: gcig ma bcu drug gi rang bzhin skye ba'i skad
NK051(zhi)005:1328: gcig ma bzhi'i ye shes kyi mtha' can /
NK051(zhi)005:1329: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1330: de ston pa ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i gzhung gi tshogs yin la /
NK051(zhi)005:1332: don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
NK051(zhi)005:1335: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas zung du bzhag pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1336: de la rgyu'i zag pa lnga zad pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1337: stong pa chen po yi ge lnga zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1338: 'bras bu'i zag pa lnga zad pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1339: thig le stong pa yi ge drug /
NK051(zhi)005:1341: de la yi ge lnga ni zad pa shes pa yin la /
NK051(zhi)005:1342: drug pa ni mi skye ba shes pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1343: bde ba'i ye shes skad gcig ma bcu drug /
NK051(zhi)005:1344: skye ba'i skad gcig ma bzhir bsdus pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1345: de'i bde ba'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid du bstan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1346: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
NK051(zhi)005:1347: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
NK051(zhi)005:1348: yan lag med pa rtsis las 'das //
NK051(zhi)005:1349: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
NK051(zhi)005:1351: bcu drug ni ye shes kyi zla ba'i cha bcu drug go //
NK051(zhi)005:1352: de'i phyed phyed ni bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1353: bde ba'i ye shes skye ba'i skad gcig bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1354: thig le can ni bzhi pa ste //
NK051(zhi)005:1355: g.yo ba med pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)005:1356: de nyid bsam bstan bzhi yi rtse mo zhes kyang bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1357: tshig 'di dag gi skabs su tha snyad du yi ge lnga da nga /
NK051(zhi)005:1360: bcu drug phyed phyed kyi zla tshes dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1361: thig le dang nga ro rnams su bshad pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1362: sgra bzhin du bshad pa zhes pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1363: tshogs la bshad pa'i tshul yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1364: 'di lta bu ni man ngag gis bshad pa yin pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1365: re zhig 'jug pa'i sgo shes par bya ba'i phyir sgo tsam smras kyi /
NK051(zhi)005:1366: 'di legs par bsgrub pa'i tshul ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1367: dbang bskur ba'i sgrub pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1368: de ni man ngag rna brgyud du bstan par bya ba yin pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1370: tshul 'di ni thabs dang shes rab chen po'i sgo nas zag pa 'bras bu nas bzlog ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1371: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i tshul /
NK051(zhi)005:1372: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'dis bstan pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1374: de'i tshul yang a +aa zhes bya ba nas bzung nas /
NK051(zhi)005:1375: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i
NK051(zhi)005:1376: bar gyi gzhung gi tshogs kyis ni yi ge drug
NK051(zhi)005:1377: bstan to // ye shes drug gis ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bstan to //
NK051(zhi)005:1378: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de ni dam pa'i yi ge yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1379: zag pa lnga zad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1380: mi g.yo ba'i bde ba thob pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1381: de ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1382: de ltar na de ston cing bsgrub pa'i gzhung gi tshogs yin no zhes 'dod do //
NK051(zhi)005:1383: de la mnyam pa chen po'i blos rgyu 'bras kyi
NK051(zhi)005:1384: sgo dbyer med par rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i
NK051(zhi)005:1385: lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i tshul gang zhe na
NK051(zhi)005:1386: / 'di la rnal 'byor can gang la la dag
