NK051(zhi)005:1387: mnyam pa chen po'i sgo nas chos thams cad gdod
NK051(zhi)005:1388: ma nas ma skyes shing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
NK051(zhi)005:1389: ba 'bras bu'i chos lhun gyis grub par rtogs shing
NK051(zhi)005:1390: / / rgyu bsgrubs pas 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus la ltos pa med pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1391: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1392: rnam par byang ba'i chos su grags pa rnams la blang ba dang dor ba med cing /
NK051(zhi)005:1393: don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu dbye ba mi
NK051(zhi)005:1394: 'byed la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul du yang 'byed
NK051(zhi)005:1396: sems dang sems snang bas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad kyang /
NK051(zhi)005:1397: 'jam dpal rdo rje'i rang bzhin du rdzogs te bsam du med pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1399: bsgrub tu med pa'i ngang du rtsol ba med par
NK051(zhi)005:1400: lhun gyis rdzogs par gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis
NK051(zhi)005:1402: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa las /
NK051(zhi)005:1403: mnyam pa chen po'i tshul lung bzhin mnos te /
NK051(zhi)005:1404: shes rab rnam pa gsum gyis sgo nas rtogs shing goms par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1405: de'i tshe yang theg pa chen po'i thabs kyi spyod
NK051(zhi)005:1406: pa rlabs po che rnams kyang bkag pa yang med
NK051(zhi)005:1407: la / zhen pas bsgrub pa'i rtsol ba yang mi bskyed do //
NK051(zhi)005:1408: bdud kyi las su gyur pa rnams kyang spang bar
NK051(zhi)005:1409: bya bar mi lta la yongs su mi 'dzin pas
NK051(zhi)005:1410: / de dag gis gos par yang mi 'gyur te /
NK051(zhi)005:1411: 'di lta bu la gnas par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1412: 'di ltar snang ba thams cad ye shes rgyan gyi rol pa la /
NK051(zhi)005:1413: sgo gsum gyi spyod pa ci yang ma bkag pa'i bsam pas mtshan brjod par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1414: de la dang por a +aa i +ai u +au
NK051(zhi)005:1415: e ee o oo am ahzhesa brjod pa na don
NK051(zhi)005:1417: yi ge sgyu 'phrul 'di ni sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa bas
NK051(zhi)005:1418: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par shes par bya'o
NK051(zhi)005:1419: // de ji lta bu zhe na /
NK051(zhi)005:1421: khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang //
NK051(zhi)005:1422: bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)005:1423: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa bas mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK051(zhi)005:1424: byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod //
NK051(zhi)005:1426: lan du sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa bas mngon par rdzogs par
NK051(zhi)005:1427: byang chub pa'i tshul ni a bcu gnyis tsam gsungs
NK051(zhi)005:1428: so // sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba de'i don rgyas pa ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1429: 'jam dpal gyi sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1430: 'jam dpal 'di ni dpal 'gyur rdzogs pa'i sku //
NK051(zhi)005:1431: thun mong ma yin gnyis med khyab pa'i chos //
NK051(zhi)005:1432: dus gsum mnyam snyoms rgyal ba kun gyi yab //
NK051(zhi)005:1433: chos dbyings yum nyid sems dpa' sras mchog ston //
NK051(zhi)005:1434: blo dang ldan pa gang zhig mdo 'di ni //
NK051(zhi)005:1435: mngon sum tshad mas gzhal nas mthong 'dod pa //
NK051(zhi)005:1436: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba 'khor lo'i tshul bzhin du //
NK051(zhi)005:1437: yi ge 'khor lo'i don gyi 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)005:1438: gdod nas dag cing skye ba med pa'i ngang //
NK051(zhi)005:1439: a +aa zhes pas 'dus ma byas pa'i chos //
NK051(zhi)005:1440: rgyu nyid med pas 'bras bu tshol med phyir //
NK051(zhi)005:1441: a ltar mnyam bzhag chos kyi sku nyid bde //
NK051(zhi)005:1442: don dam dbyings nyid mkha' ltar dmigs med khyab //
NK051(zhi)005:1443: thub par rang bzhin med par gnas pa la //
NK051(zhi)005:1444: 'jam dpal ral gris btab na gcod par ltar //
NK051(zhi)005:1445: a yi gu gu thugs rje ngang nyid 'phro //
NK051(zhi)005:1446: i +ai zhes pa chos kyi yum nyid lam //
NK051(zhi)005:1447: shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs //
NK051(zhi)005:1448: ldang dang mi ldang blang dor med tshul gyis //
NK051(zhi)005:1449: thun mong ma yin bsti gnas kun tu bzang //
NK051(zhi)005:1450: med pa'i ngang nyid med pa las byung ba //
NK051(zhi)005:1451: u +au zhes pa med pa'i snying po 'byung //
NK051(zhi)005:1452: ye shes chen po yod med mtha' las 'das //
NK051(zhi)005:1453: che ba'i ngang gis 'gro kun dga' la sbyor //
NK051(zhi)005:1454: nyid dang gnyis med bsam 'das brjod bral ba //
NK051(zhi)005:1455: gru gsum e yi rang bzhin nyid mi g.yo //
NK051(zhi)005:1456: e zhes tha snyad btags shing brjod dang bral //
NK051(zhi)005:1457: sems dang sems ni 'jam dpal ting 'dzin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1458: thabs dang shes rab sgyu 'phrul sgyu 'dra'i tshogs //
NK051(zhi)005:1460: 'ja' tshon rnam pa so sor yid bzhin sbyor //
NK051(zhi)005:1461: 'jam dpal 'jam dpal rnam par rol ba bde //
NK051(zhi)005:1462: rnal 'byor chen po ye shes 'byor ba'i dpal //
NK051(zhi)005:1463: nam mkha' mi dmigs am zhes ye shes mdzod //
NK051(zhi)005:1464: shes rab ye shes ma 'dres a las 'das //
NK051(zhi)005:1465: stong nyid ci la'ang ma reg lhun gyis grub //
NK051(zhi)005:1466: don kun 'byor pas blang dor med pa yi //
NK051(zhi)005:1467: bdag nyid rang bzhin bzhag dang 'jam dpal nyid //
NK051(zhi)005:1468: bsam gyis mi khyab mi gnas mi sems na //
NK051(zhi)005:1469: 'jam dpal nyid dang yon tan rdzogs par mnyam //
NK051(zhi)005:1471: yi ge sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba 'di'i sgo nas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1472: a ni gdod ma nas skye ba med cing 'dus ma byas pas rgyu ma grub pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:1473: 'bras bu btsal du med pas gdod ma nas chos kyi sku bde ba chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1474: e ni de nyid nam mkha' ltar mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)005:1475: shes rab chen pos de ltar chod cing /
NK051(zhi)005:1476: mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'phro ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1477: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid gdod ma nas yin pa'i rang bzhin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1478: u ni de lta bu bas na kun tu bzang po'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1479: 'di ltar mtshan ma dang rtog pa ldang ba la ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1481: mi ldang ba la dang du mi len te /
NK051(zhi)005:1482: byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po mtha' las
NK051(zhi)005:1483: 'das pa che ba'i ngang gis 'gro ba kun kyang
NK051(zhi)005:1484: bde ba chen po la rang bzhin gyis sbyor ba'o
NK051(zhi)005:1485: // e ni de ltar na chos thams cad bsam brjod dang bral zhing g.yo ba med la /
NK051(zhi)005:1486: tha snyad du mi 'grub pas sems dang sems kyi
NK051(zhi)005:1487: rnam par rtog pa'ang 'jam dpal dang 'jam dpal gyi
NK051(zhi)005:1489: o ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir na /
NK051(zhi)005:1490: sems kyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs su snang ba thams cad kyang /
NK051(zhi)005:1491: thabs dang shes rab sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i tshogs yin te /
NK051(zhi)005:1493: 'gro ba so so'i yid dang mthun par sbyor ba
NK051(zhi)005:1494: 'jam dpal rnam par rol ba'i cho 'phrul bde ba
NK051(zhi)005:1495: chen po las ma nyams pa'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1496: am ni de ltar 'byor ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i ye shes dpal thams cad kyi 'byung gnas /
NK051(zhi)005:1497: nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1499: shes rab dang ye shes chos thams cad la ma reg cing kun las 'das pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1500: de lta na yi ge bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)005:1501: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni chos thams cad la gdod
NK051(zhi)005:1502: ma nas blang dor med par rang bzhin gyis sangs
NK051(zhi)005:1503: rgyas pa ste / de ltar don thams cad rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid du ye nas gnas pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1504: rnal 'byor can gang gis chos thams cad de ltar rtogs te /
NK051(zhi)005:1505: chos gang la yang mi gnas /
NK051(zhi)005:1509: 'jam dpal nyid dang yon tan rdzogs par mnyam pa yin no zhes bshad do //
NK051(zhi)005:1510: yang de nyid las gsungs pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1511: ji ltar sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba nyid kyi tshul //
NK051(zhi)005:1512: grags ma thag tu don reg gsal //
NK051(zhi)005:1514: rang bzhin chos nyid sku yi dbyings //
NK051(zhi)005:1515: i +ai zhes pa g.yo ba med //
NK051(zhi)005:1516: ma bskyod ngang las yum du gsal //
NK051(zhi)005:1517: u +au zhes pa skye ba med //
NK051(zhi)005:1518: dag pa'i ngang nyid kun tu bzang //
NK051(zhi)005:1519: rgyud las rgyal ba sems dpa' ste //
NK051(zhi)005:1520: ye shes ngang nyid gcod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1521: e ee zhes pa mkha' la sbyor //
NK051(zhi)005:1522: 'bras bu med pas rgyu la gnas //
NK051(zhi)005:1523: de ma dag par gsal ba yis //
NK051(zhi)005:1525: o oo zhes pa e las 'das //
NK051(zhi)005:1526: zhes gsang sngags thabs chen bstan //
NK051(zhi)005:1527: e dang o yi rang bzhin dbyings //
NK051(zhi)005:1528: mum ni ngo bo nyid kyi mkha' //
NK051(zhi)005:1529: a las rnam par rol ba bstan //
NK051(zhi)005:1530: am gis gnyis med 'byor pa yis //
NK051(zhi)005:1531: zab mo rdo rje ting 'dzin mtha' //
NK051(zhi)005:1532: ma zhes mnyam dang mi mnyam med //
NK051(zhi)005:1533: 'jam dpal ye shes rdo rje rdzogs //
NK051(zhi)005:1536: mi gnas rdo rje rtse mo ste //
NK051(zhi)005:1537: bsam tshul sgrub pa med pa yi //
NK051(zhi)005:1538: dbyings nyid bzhag na yongs su rdzogs //
NK051(zhi)005:1540: tshul 'di yang snga ma bzhin du //
NK051(zhi)005:1541: yi ge bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas //
NK051(zhi)005:1542: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du //
NK051(zhi)005:1543: mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa'i rang bzhin ye
NK051(zhi)005:1544: nas rtsol sgrub las 'das par sangs rgyas pa'i rang
NK051(zhi)005:1546: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang de lta bu
NK051(zhi)005:1547: yin pas rnal 'byor can gyis kyang de lta bu'i
NK051(zhi)005:1549: 'jam dpal gyi yon tan kyang rdzogs so zhes bshad do //
NK051(zhi)005:1550: de yang re zhig yi ge a +aa ni 'jam dpal chos kyi sku'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1551: i +ai ni yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1552: u +au ni byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1553: sems nyid sems dpa' chen po'i rang bzhin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1555: 'du 'bral med pa'i mkha' la sbyor ba'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1556: o oo ni de las 'das pa'i yi ge 'khor
NK051(zhi)005:1557: lo tshogs chen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i 'phrul pa rang
NK051(zhi)005:1559: o la am sbyar na du 'gyur te /
NK051(zhi)005:1560: de ni gsang sngags kyi sku'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1561: am gi klad kor ni mum ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1562: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis grol ba'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1563: am ni yon tan thams cad 'byor ba'i gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1564: klad kor gyi ma ni chos mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par dbyer med pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1565: 'di lta bu'i don gyi 'jam dpal ye shes rdo rje ni /
NK051(zhi)005:1566: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' mi gnas pa'i ye shes rdo rje rtse mo ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1567: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang de lta bu yin pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1569: de ltar khong du chud par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1570: chos thams cad ni bsam par bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)005:1572: bsgrub par bya ba thams cad las 'das pa ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1573: gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1575: ye nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1576: rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1577: 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin du mngon par rdzogs para byang chub pa yin pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1578: 'di lta bu'i ngang la blo bzhag ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1579: mtshan brjod pa ji snyed pa yang /
NK051(zhi)005:1580: de lta bu'i rang bzhin ston pa sha dag ste /
NK051(zhi)005:1581: thabs dang shes rab sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i tshogs su gyur pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1582: chos nyid kyi rgyan ye shes kyi rol pa /
NK051(zhi)005:1583: 'gag pa med pa'i cho 'phrul du rtogs nas /
NK051(zhi)005:1584: blang dor dang rtsol sgrub kyi rtog pas mi g.yo bar brjod par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1585: brjod pa rdzogs nas kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtogs pas /
NK051(zhi)005:1586: las kyi mtha' yongs su ma mthong ba'i bsam pas gnas par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1587: mtshan gnyis su med par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i
NK051(zhi)005:1588: tshul bstan pa zhes bya ba rnam pa gsum gyi
NK051(zhi)005:1589: mtshan nyid can bstan pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)005:1590: mtshan tsam rnam par bshad pas kyang //
NK051(zhi)005:1591: gzhung gi spyi tsam rtogs pa dang //
NK051(zhi)005:1592: sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa'i //
NK051(zhi)005:1593: 'jug sgo tshul tsam shes bya'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)005:1594: 'jam dpal mtshan bcas brjod tshul bcas //
NK051(zhi)005:1595: rnam gsum bshad pa tsam byas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)005:1596: d+harma b+ha dras mdzad pa'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel ba'o //
